title: Navam Perahera Photos (2015)
abstract: The Navam Perahera is the biggest procession of its kind in Colombo. These are some photos taken by Nazly Ahmed,…
content:
The Navam Perahera is the biggest procession of its kind in Colombo. These are some photos taken by Nazly Ahmed, who you should follow on Twitter (
).
Elephants are a vital part of the perahera tradition, but they don't seem to enjoy it that much. We hope this is a tradition that will get phased out over time.
To see
.
We hope you had a peaceful Poya and a
. Thanks again to Nazly for the photos.
